doc:
Lorenzo Lamas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lorenzo_Lamas 0 Lorenzo Fernando Lamas (born January 20, 1958) is an American actor and martial artist. He is known for playing Lance Cumson, the irresponsible grandson of Angela Channing (played by Jane Wyman) on the 1980s soap opera Falcon Crest (Golden Globe Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor – Series, Miniseries or Television Film). During and after Falcon Crest, he and Ana Alicia, who played his wife in the series have remained close friends. He later went on to play Reno Raines on the 1990s crime drama Renegade, and Hector Ramirez on the daytime soap opera The Bold and the Beautiful. He served as a judge on ABC television's Are You Hot? and starred in his own reality show, Leave It to Lamas, a series about his real-life family. Lorenzo_Fernando_Lamas ( born January_20_,_1958 ) is an_American_actor and martial_artist . During_and_after Falcon_Crest , he and Ana_Alicia , who played his_wife in the_series have_remained close_friends . He later went on to_play Reno_Raines on the_1990s_crime_drama_Renegade , and Hector_Ramirez on the_daytime_soap_opera The_Bold and the_Beautiful . He served as a_judge on ABC_television 's_Are You Hot ? and starred in his_own_reality_show , Leave It to Lamas , a_series about his_real-life_family .
